name: Flappy Slots
description:
Who said that there is no place for innovations in social casino games and we should spin 18 century's reels till the end of our lives? 

Flappy Slots is an experimental attempt to combine slots mechanics with popular casual games. We do believe that games of chance for millennials SHOULD BE DIFFERENT. Game is in development (levels & mathematics), plz subscribe for updates. Thanks.

Try it out and let us know what do you think!
